column5: Welcome aboard Steve keep them pics coming you will like it here lots of helpful folks a few whackos but we put up with them.
Nice job.  I like six mile.  Maybe it is just the pic but that pike looks like it has a huge head.
Thanks for the warm welcome..I'll throw up a few more reports soon...the pike was about 2-3 feet but kinda skinny
Great report and pics Steve  Keep them coming! Leechman
Nice first report and welcome! Hope to see many more reports and pics
Welcome aboard, that's a great report to start! Keep it up and look forward to see your other reports!

Great first report Steve!  Glad to hear you had a great outing....I have learned a TON from other members of the board as well.  When I was caught in thunderstorms on the weekend my mind kept wandering to that thread about lightning from a few weeks ago....LOL.  I kept looking at the tip of my fishing rod to see if it started to crackle a bit.  Looking forward to more of your reports!
thanks for the report! Welcome to the board.
Congrats, big yapper on that Piker. Welcome and look forward to more of your reports.  Cheers, 1leg
Hey Steve,  Is this you?  I came across it by accident seconds after seeing your intro!

Ya that's Me! that pic is from june 2008. The Pike was caught in the T.O islands by Alan Slocombe of "Al's Adventures". guiding. I went out with him to learn about...catching pike. Had a great time. He snagged the pike on a crackbait or stickbait of sorts, I believe, and I got to get it to the boat. Really nice fish, and made for some nice pics. Where did you find the photo?-sk
sorry that was a crankbait...not a crackbait...but that might also work..LOL-sk

Um,  I dunno.  I was doing a random search of toronto pike and after all the fishing fury spam I found that pic. I think it was on fish ontario's forum?????  It's weird, I just recognized your pic!!!     Uh, dude, Can you hook me up with pike zing?  Just kidding, heh heh  (pm me if you can, just be cool about it.)
Hey snag, Sorry! no pike zing here...worms do work well too however. Could you post (or pm me) the link to the photo if you can, I'm curious where it ended up.. weird eh. Thanks!
Thanks! fish looks better each time I see the pic...wish I could say the same for myself...
